about_the_game:
Welcome to Skullivan's!

Skullivan's is a third-person simulation where you operate your own cemetery convenience store by digging up rewards, decorating & expanding your store, and satisfying your ghoulish customer's needs.

Dig up Grave rewards:

Bury your regulars and dig them up for new products, employees, & decorations.

Order Products:

Call in Gore-mark delivery to supply you with bone-chilling products to stock your dusty shelves.

Customer Service:

Checkout undead customers by scanning products and collecting their crux.

Tasks:

Keep the windows, floors, and trash clean to keep your customers satisfied with their visit to Skully's.

short_description: Operate your own cemetery convenience store, catering a mix of ghostly customers, ghoulish guests, and eerie creatures. Stock your shelves with spine-chilling products and hire an unlikely team of spectral staff. Expand and design your spooky mansion, creating a uniquely haunted shopping experience.
